main event: A civilian in Waynesville, Ohio reported seeing a fast-moving, bright object in the sky that changed colors from green to red and blue in 1965.
interesting points: The object was visible for only about 1 second.
The witness was not sure of the exact colors, but described seeing a bright light.
The witness had seen similar objects on several previous occasions.
The witness was hesitant to talk about the sighting with many people, as they know many people do not take UFO sightings seriously.
The Air Force responded by requesting the witness fill out a form with more details to assist in evaluating the sighting.
sighted object: a fast-moving, bright object that changed colors
